Posts.EditableText: I found this some months ago, it has some pretty good music (and some 'meh' music too), so if you're interested: (and the poster, 'IronRainDrops', who does the poetry in the comments of these vids, has some really good poetry that goes with the music~setting~theme of the vids, and the animated~transitional pics used for the vids' background fits the music well too) https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC26zQl ... p9zKHVmv4Q (the account: HDSounDI) https://www.youtube.com/user/MarK1Ira/playlists (the vids of the account) some pretty good music, hehe ------- one of the ones that I really like: most wonderous battle music ever -> "fearless" by Thomas Bergersen ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LvPLfUr ... 15500F5554 ) ------------------ another similiar account of music: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCisb8F ... iRfLSlHMkQ https://www.youtube.com/user/ThoughtsOf ... /playlists and this song, I just absolutely love, I can't stop listening to it (laughs): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vPNvZHmMD6w so, epic!
Posts.HTML:
I found this some months ago, it has some pretty good music (and some 'meh' music too), so if you're interested:

(and the poster, 'IronRainDrops', who does the poetry in the comments of these vids, has some really good poetry that goes with the music~setting~theme of the vids, and the animated~transitional pics used for the vids' background fits the music well too)

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC26zQl ... p9zKHVmv4Q (the account: HDSounDI)
https://www.youtube.com/user/MarK1Ira/playlists (the vids of the account)

some pretty good music, hehe

-------

one of the ones that I really like:

most wonderous battle music ever
-> "fearless" by Thomas Bergersen ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LvPLfUr ... 15500F5554 )

------------------

another similiar account of music:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCisb8F ... iRfLSlHMkQ
https://www.youtube.com/user/ThoughtsOf ... /playlists

and this song, I just absolutely love, I can't stop listening to it (laughs):

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vPNvZHmMD6w

so, epic!
